ValidationRule.description: The method of creation of this User record. This is populated from the New User application. Enforces the user application usages
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISNEW() && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) && ISBLANK(Creation_Type__c) && NOT(Profile.Name = "Chatter External User") && OR(ISPICKVAL(UserType,'Standard'),ISPICKVAL(UserType,'CsnOnly'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ***** New user records have to be created using the New User tab in the Paychex Data Management application *****
